name: Arcadeoid
description:
Taking inspiration from top arcade classics, Arcadeoid is an old-school block breaker game updated for modern gamers.

Break blocks, earn points, power up and smash the highscores table! Control your paddle to keep bouncing the balls back at the constantly encroaching blocks. Infinite gameplay means you'll keep playing until you run out of balls or the blocks reach your paddle!

KEY FEATURES
- Classic arcade coin-op experience: retro graphics, sounds & gameplay.
- Skill based challange: The paddle has no speed restrictions, it moves as fast as you do.
- Infinite Gameplay: No levels, no limits. Play until you lose! 

POWER UPS
- Extra Ball: Fires a new ball from the paddle. There's no limits to how many balls you can have in play!
- Extra Points: Score 5 bonus points for every ball still in play.
- Super Ball: This ball doesn't bounce! It just destroys everything in its path.
- Curve: Curved Paddle makes it easier to pull off those tricky skill-shots. Control the balls to fire them into tunnels for maximum points and insane amounts of power ups!
- Laser: Turn the paddle into a gun-ship and blast your way through the blocks.
- Extended Paddle: Easily keep more balls in play with a longer paddle. More balls means more points and more power ups!
